scripts.build:cjs: tsc --target es2022 --module commonjs --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --outDir dist/cjs exports-named-test.ts && mv dist/cjs/exports-named-test.js dist/cjs/exports-named-test.cjs
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/cjs/exports-named-test.cjs && node dist/esm/exports-named-test.js && node exports-default-test.cjs
